homepage.heroSubtitle: Connecting students from around the world at National Taipei University of Technology.
homepage.whatWeDoSubtitle: We are here to make your journey at NTUT unforgettable.
homepage.featureCulturalText: Experience diverse cultures through festivals, food fairs, and international celebrations right here on campus.
homepage.featureAcademicText: Get help with your studies, find resources, and connect with senior students through our workshops and mentoring programs.
homepage.featureSocialText: Make friends from all over the globe at our parties, sports events, and casual meetups.
